name: Hanoi And Halong Family Holiday
description:
This short Vietnam family tour combines discovery of Hanoi and Halong Bay, one
of seven natural wonders of the world. Visit Hanoi with its old quarter and
then take a nice Halong Bay cruise to
see another site of Halong Bay, Bai Tu Long Bay, where you can admire an
untouched area of the bay with impressive lime stone grotto, fishing village, hidden lagoons and geological park.
